jobDescription: Teespring is revolutionizing e-commerce through our platform that empowers anyone to easily turn their ideas into life and offer them to the world. Creators use our platform to sell high-quality products people love, with just an idea and no cost or risk. Teespring powers all aspects of bringing merchandise to life from the e-commerce tools to printing it on-demand to delivering it to buyers. Teespring has helped creators sell over 25 million products in more than 80 countries.Data ScientistWhat does our team do? The Data team is composed of analysts, data scientists and engineers who are responsible for core data collections and application. We provide analysis, build tools, and offer critical insights that drive our strategy and decision making.What is the job? The Data Scientist will be responsible for discovering hidden information in vast amounts of data and helping the team make smarter decisions to deliver even better products. The role has two practice areas. First, descriptive data science focuses on applying data mining techniques and doing statistical analysis to better understand our users and make business decisions based on their behavior. Excellent communication skills including the ability to identify and communicate data driven insights Insatiable curiously and high aptitudeBonus Points: Massive scale relational databases Hadoop/Spark related experience Object oriented programming experience Experience in developing recommendation engines or algorithmsWhat do we offer?Happiness is just as important to us as hard work.
